annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体官方公报

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2637/1999
annotations.translation: 委员会 (EC) 第 2637/1999 号条例

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 14 December 1999

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: amending Regulation (EC) No 2848/98 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2075/92 as regards the premium scheme, production quotas and the specific aid to be granted to producer groups in the raw tobacco sector
annotations.translation: 修正 (EC) 第 2848/98 号条例，该条例规定了理事会 (EEC) 第 2075/92 号条例的适用细则，涉及烟草原料行业保费计划、生产配额和向生产商团体提供的具体援助

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2075/92 of 30 June 1992 on the common organisation of the market in raw tobacco (¹), as last amended by Regulation (E) No 660 / 1999 (²), and in particular Articles 11 and 14a thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到经 (E) 第 660/1999 号条例 (²) 最后修正的 1992 年 6 月 30 日关于烟草原料市场 (¹) 共同组织的理事会 (EEC) 第 2075/92 号条例，特别是其中第 11 条和第 14a 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Regulation (EC) No 2848/98 is hereby amended as follows:
annotations.translation: (EC) 第 2848/98 号条例现修正如下：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
annotations.translation: 本条例将在《欧洲共同体官方公报》上公布后第三日起生效。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: It shall apply with effect from the 2000 harvest.
annotations.translation: 该条例应自 2000 年采收季节起生效。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Commission Regulation (EC) No 2848/98 of 22 December 1998 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2075/92 as regards the premium scheme, production quotas and the specific aid to be granted to producer groups in the raw tobacco sector (³), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2162/1999 (⁴), lays down 31 January of the year of harvest as the date by which quota statements must be issued to individual producers who are not members of a producer group and to producer groups and allows the competent authority of the Member State a period of 20 days in which to register written agreements between individual producers on the permanent transfer of quotas;
annotations.translation: (1) 1998 年 12 月 22 日委员会（EC) 第 2848/98 号条例规定了理事会 (EEC) 第 2075/92 号条例的适用细则，该条例涉及向烟草原料行业生产商团体提供的溢价计划、生产配额和具体援助 (³)，据 (EC) 第 2162/1999 号 (⁴) 条例的最新修正，规定采收年份的 1 月 31 日为必须向不属于生产商团体的个体生产商和生产商团体发布配额声明的日期，并允许成员国主管机构在 20 天内登记个体生产商之间关于永久转让配额的书面协议；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) More time is required to complete the procedures for issuing quota statements and registering written agreements on the transfer of quotas in certain Member States in view of the administrative checks that must be carried out, in particular checks on parcels. The deadline for issuing the quota statements to individual producers who are not members of a producer group and to groups of producers should therefore be extended by one month and the period for registering written agreements on the permanent transfer of quotas by 10 days;
annotations.translation: (2) 鉴于必须进行行政检查，特别是对包裹的检查，在某些成员国需要更多时间才能完成发布配额声明和登记配额转让书面协议的程序。因此，向不属于生产商团体的个体生产商和生产商团体发布配额声明的期限应延长一个月，登记永久转让配额书面协议的期限延长 10 天；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) Article 36 of Regulation (EC) No 2848/98 lays down the amounts to be paid to producers whose quotas have been bought back for the 1999 harvest under the quota buy-back scheme. The amounts to which producers
annotations.translation: (3) (EC) 第 2848/98 号条例第 36 条规定了根据配额回购计划向已回购 1999 年采收配额的生产商支付的金额。生产商的金额

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: whose quotas will be bought back for the 2000 harvest will be entitled should now be laid down, without prejudice to future amendments;
annotations.translation: 在不影响未来修正的情况下，现在应规定在 2000 年采收季节将被回购配额的有权获得；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) The quantities which have been the subject of a quota buy-back application and the quantities bought back by group of varieties under Article 35 of Regulation (EC) No 2848/98, which must be notified to the Commission under Article 54 (j) of that Regulation, will not be available before 31 December 1999. The buy-back amounts agreed for the 1999 harvest should therefore be retained for the 2000 harvest;
annotations.translation: (4) 根据 (EC) 第 2848/98 号条例第 35 条的规定，配额回购申请的数量和按品种组回购的数量必须根据该条例第 54(j) 条通知委员会，这些数量在 1999 年 12 月 31 日之前将无法获得。 因此，为 1999 年采收季节商定的回购数量应保留到 2000 年采收季节；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Management Committee for Tobacco,
annotations.translation: (5) 本条例规定的措施符合烟草管理委员会的意见，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. In Article 22 (3) the words '31 January' are replaced by the end of February'.
annotations.translation: 1. 第 22(3) 条中的“1 月 31 日”替换为“2 月底”。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. In Article 33 (2) the word 'twenty' is replaced by the word 'thirty'.
annotations.translation: 2. 第 33(2) 条中的“二十”一词替换为“三十”。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. The following paragraph is added to Article 36:
annotations.translation: 3. 第 36 条增加以下段落：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 'Producers whose quotas have been bought back in respect of the 2000 harvest will be entitled each year on payment of the premiums for the 2001, 2002 and 2003 harvests to the amounts indicated in the first paragraph in respect of the 1999 harvest.'
annotations.translation: “其 2000 年采收配额已被回购的生产商在支付 2001 年、2002 年和 2003 年采收的保费后，每年有权获得第一段所述的 1999 年采收的相关金额。”
